body.name: Citrus Magic Natural Odor Eliminating Air Freshener Spray, Tropical Lemon, 3-Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
features: ALL MAGIC, NO TRICKS: Indulge in the fragrance of tropical lemon with this air freshener that eliminates odors and sprinkles the air with freshness, and not just water and aerosols.

NO HARMFUL INGREDIENTS: Our thoughtfully chosen, cruelty-free ingredients are pet-safe, kid-safe, and of course, super-busy-parent safe when used as directed. Spray peacefully knowing that it has no harmful chemicals.

ESCAPE IN THE FRAGRANCE OF TROPICAL LEMON: Spray these air fresheners for home in areas that need a punch of freshness or spots such as bathrooms, basements, closets that constantly need odor-control and keep them smelling of fresh lemon.

SPRAY OF FRESHNESS: Whether there are guests coming home, or you are spending some quality time with your partner, or you just want to refresh the vibe of a room or a corner, this odor eliminator will deliver exactly what you want.

YOUR NEW FAVORITE: With a breezy, beachfront blend of zesty lemon and tropical fruit, this is an ideal room spray for home, office, and places that requires freshening up without any harsh chemicals like propellants, formaldehyde, parabens, and more!
body.description: Spritz the magical freshness and swirling, revitalizing scents of this magic spray air freshener to bring every nook and cranny of your home to life. Top off your cleaning routine, spray before a guest arrives, reminisce memories, or lift your mood with a burst of a citrus-based air freshener spray made with pure citrus oils. With our 100% active ingredients you are getting a room spray that is loaded with ingredients that help to eliminate odors without wasting money on water and aerosols. Our products are safe when used as directed, free from harsh chemicals like parabens, formaldehyde, phthalates, benzene, and more, and proud to be cruelty-free. Find your favorite scent to express yourself and spray your personality in the spaces you love! Some call it science. We call it magic. Citrus Magic air freshener spray is a revolutionary way to prevent and eliminate smelly odors in your home! The ingredients work 100% to absorb and eliminate harmful toxins and the source, leaving behind delightfully clean and fresh air. Whether it's your living area or your bathroom, Citrus Magic is your ideal fragrant solution! From humidity to mold, the odor-absorbing power of Citrus Magic can do it all. Its special agents eliminate unwanted smells before they can do any harm. Citrus Magic air fresheners for home: A happy medium of an odor saver for your house without the harsh chemicals. Dedicated to our generation and future generations of Citrus Magic air freshener, we are committed to quality and service. It’s like poof and odors have vanished! Just like magic. Escape in the mesmerizing essence of a sweet, citrusy orange with Citrus Magic Tropical Lemon Air Freshener Spray!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kinda different. Follow the instructions.
reviews.reviewText: The smell is natural and pleasant. The tropical lemon smelled like lemon drop candy tastes. It takes a minute to to spread from the center of the room. Long lasting. The smell keeps getting stronger as it spreads, and it stays for quite some time. You can smell it a couple of rooms away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, smells good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good product
reviews.reviewText: Very good air freshener. I have Huskies that travel in my car with me almost daily. This lemon scent really does get rid of the wet dog smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a true odor eliminating spray for years. Everything I tried left a very heavy unpleasant scent. This stuff is truly amazing! The container is not large but don’t let that persuade your decision about buying this product. It literally takes one tiny spray to totally eliminate the odor in the bathroom without having an unpleasant odor go through the rest of your house. Awesome product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A+++ Seller. As Described and Quick Shipping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love Citrus Magic
reviews.reviewText: I love Citrus Magic spray. Not only the lemon scented spray but the orange as well. The scent lasts long and I don't need to use a lot. It eliminates odors fast too. I've been using CM for years. I recommend it over other products that don't work as well and are harmful to the environment. This stuff is all natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As I get older, I’m more sensitive to fake smells. Using this product is like peeling a fresh piece of citrus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The lemon scent is strong but pleasing. However, if I am to use it in the kitchen, it will last me maybe a few days only rendering it quite expensive.

I used this about 15 years ago at a hospital. It was wonderful. I contacted the 800 number on the can and have been ordering it directly from the company in Toronto Canada ever since. Now it is available on Amazon. I buy about 3 cans a year and so, even though it is expensive, we love it and feel it is definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best lemon scent air freshener I've ever purchased period. That being said - the supply chain needs to be fixed as the price is currently at almost £18 per can at the time of this review. Terrific product, but it simply doesn't justify the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic non-chemicalised spray. Lovely refreshing scent. Top marks. One point: no need to thrash it around whilst spraying - just a short, sharp burst is plenty, and therefore, this product is economical and lasts a good long while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 3, 2020
reviews.reviewText: An air freshener that clears cooking or any odours rather than mask them and needs only the slightest spray. It has a fresh clear scent. I've used both the Orange and Lemon scented so far. These are a little more expensive than most but does what it says and it's own scent doesn't linger forever, simply clears the air.
